text: == Events == * February 14: First known mention of Lithuania, in the annals of the monastery of Quedlinburg.In the Annals of Quedlinburg, Saxony-Anhalt. * October 18: The Church of the Holy Sepulchre is destroyed by Caliph al-Hakim bi-Amr Allah. * The Ly dynasty, Vietnam's first independent dynasty, is proclaimed. * Sergius IV succeeds John XVIII as Pope. * Suleiman II succeeds Mohammed II as Caliph of Cordoba. * Provinces of Goryeo (modern-day Korea) are redistributed. == Births == * Goda of England, Duchess of Brittany, sister of Edward the Confessor (died 1063) * Saint Osmund, Bishop of Salisbury, second Lord Chancellor of England (died 1099) == Deaths == * Pope John XVIII == References ==
